Learn about the Sikh principle of meditation

Naam Japo

Naam Japo, meaning 'Meditate on the Name', is one of the three main pillars of Sikhism. It emphasizes the importance of remembering and connecting with the Divine through meditation and prayer.

Key Aspects of Naam Japo

üßò

Simran

Meditation and remembrance of the Divine Name through repetition.

üéµ

Kirtan

Musical recitation of Gurbani and devotional hymns.

üìø

Nitnem

Daily prayers and recitation of prescribed Sikh prayers.
